mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(cnt), 0) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT COUNT(a.stock_count) AS cnt FROM logistics_stock a JOIN logistics b ON a.logistics_id = b.logistics_id where stock_count >= 0 and b.person_id = #{personId} GROUP BY b.person_id )

select distinct a.details_order_number, a.count, a.order_condition, a.in_operation, a.person_id, b.lot, b.in_day, b.in_count, b.out_count, b.expiration_limit, c.material_number, c.material_name, d.logistics_id, d.client_id from logistics_order_details a join logistics_in b on a.details_order_number = b.details_order_number join material c on a.material_number = c.material_number join logistics_order d on a.order_number = d.order_number where c.material_number = #{materialNumber} and b.in_count - b.out_count != 0 order by b.expiration_limit

select a.order_number, a.note, a.client_id, b.order_condition, b.person_id, b.in_operation, c.logistics_id, d.client_name, sum(b.count) as sum from logistics_order a join logistics_order_details b on a.order_number = b.order_number join logistics c on a.logistics_id = c.logistics_id join supplier d on a.client_id = d.client_id where c.logistics_id = #{logisticsId} and b.in_operation = 'f1' group by a.order_number, a.note, a.client_id, b.order_condition, b.person_id, b.in_operation, c.logistics_id, d.client_name

select distinct a.details_order_number, a.count, a.unit, a.order_cost, a.person_id, b.order_number, c.logistics_id, c.logistics_name, c.phone as logisticsPhone, d.material_name, e.material_number from logistics_order_details a join logistics_order b on a.order_number = b.order_number join logistics c on b.logistics_id = c.logistics_id join material d on a.material_number = d.material_number join company_material e on d.material_number = e.material_number where b.order_number = #{orderNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into logistics_in( lot, details_order_number, in_day, in_count, expiration_limit, consumption_limit, manufacture_day, inspection_operation, person_id, logistics_id, material_number, out_count, disposal_operation )values( 'LOT' || LPAD(LOT_SEQ.nextval, '7', '0'), #{detailsOrderNumber}, #{inDay}, #{inCount}, #{expirationLimit}, #{consumptionLimit}, #{manufactureDay}, #{inspectionOperation}, #{personId}, #{logisticsId}, #{materialNumber}, 0, 'd1' )
mapper.update: merge into logistics_stock a using dual on (a.material_number = #{materialNumber} and a.logistics_id = #{logisticsId}) when matched then update set a.stock_count = a.stock_count + #{stockCount} when not matched then insert( a.stock_number, a.stock_count, a.logistics_id, a.material_number )values( 'INV' || LPAD(INV_SEQ.nextval, 7, '0'), #{stockCount}, #{logisticsId}, #{materialNumber} )
mapper.select: select distinct a.details_order_number, a.count, a.order_condition, a.in_operation, a.person_id, b.lot, b.in_day, b.in_count, b.out_count, c.material_number, c.material_name, d.logistics_id, d.client_id from logistics_order_details a join logistics_in b on a.details_order_number = b.details_order_number join material c on a.material_number = c.material_number join logistics_order d on a.order_number = d.order_number where b.lot = #{lot}
mapper.insert: insert into logistics_out( logistics_out_number, out_date, logistics_id, out_count, note, out_operation, lot )values( 'DV' || LPAD(DV_SEQ.nextval, '7', '0'), #{outDate}, #{logisticsId}, #{outCount}, #{note}, #{outOperation}, #{lot} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, a.* FROM ( select a.order_number, sum(b.count) as count, a.oder_app, c.logistics_id, c.store_name, d.out_operation, e.person_id from store_order a join order_details b on a.order_number = b.order_number join store c on a.store_number = c.store_number join logistics_out d on b.order_details_number = d.order_details_number join logistics_in e on d.lot = e.lot where d.out_operation = 'g2' and e.person_id = #{personId} group by a.order_number, a.oder_app, c.logistics_id, c.store_name, d.out_operation, e.person_id order by a.order_number desc ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) b WHERE R > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}

select a.order_number, sum(b.count) as count, a.oder_app, c.logistics_id, c.store_name from store_order a join order_details b on a.order_number = b.order_number join store c on a.store_number = c.store_number where a.oder_app = 'L2' group by a.order_number, a.oder_app, c.logistics_id, c.store_name order by a.order_number desc

select distinct a.order_details_number, a.material_number, a.order_number, a.count, b.material_name, b.unit, c.store_number, d.store_name, d.phone, e.inspection from order_details a join material b on a.material_number = b.material_number join store_order c on a.order_number = c.order_number join store d on c.store_number = d.store_number join logistics_out e on a.order_details_number = e.order_details_number where a.order_number = #{orderNumber}

select a.lot, a.in_count, a.out_count, a.in_day, b.details_order_number, c.material_number, c.material_name from logistics_in a join logistics_order_details b on a.details_order_number = b.details_order_number join material c on b.material_number = c.material_number where c.material_number = #{materialNumber} and a.in_count - a.out_count != 0
mapper.insert: insert into logistics_out( logistics_out_number, out_date, logistics_id, inspection, out_count, lot )values( #{logisticsOutNumber}, #{outDate}, #{logisticsId}, #{inspection}, #{outCount}, #{lot} )
mapper.select: select a.person_id, a.name, a.email, a.phone, a.area, a.department, a.position, b.logistics_name, b.logistics_id from person a join logistics b on a.area = b.logistics_id where a.person_id = #{personId}
